meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Distract</kanji> me with a <kanji>twist</kanji> in what we're doing. Just imagine you're working on something. Then, you get distracted by a twist in whatever it is that you're working on. This little twist doesn't destroy everything, but it does cause a <vocabulary>complication</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>confusion</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
